Package xaero.pac.common.claims.tracker.api

Interface IClaimsManagerListenerAPI

public interface IClaimsManagerListenerAPI
The interface to be implemented by all claims manager listeners

Register your listeners in IClaimsManagerTrackerAPI.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    onChunkChange(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation dimension, int chunkX, int chunkZ, IPlayerChunkClaimAPI claim)
    Called after the claim state of a chunk is updated.
    void
    onWholeRegionChange(net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation dimension, int regionX, int regionZ)
    Called after a whole 512x512 region of claim states is updated.

  • Method Details

    • onWholeRegionChange

      void onWholeRegionChange(@Nonnull net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation dimension, int regionX, int regionZ)
      Called after a whole 512x512 region of claim states is updated.

      Override this method and register the listener in IClaimsManagerTrackerAPI to handle region claim state updates however you'd like.

      This method is only called on the client side at the time of writing this.

      Parameters:
      dimension - the dimension of the region, not null
      regionX - the X coordinate of the region
      regionZ - the Z coordinate of the region

    • onChunkChange

      void onChunkChange(@Nonnull net.minecraft.resources.ResourceLocation dimension, int chunkX, int chunkZ, @Nullable IPlayerChunkClaimAPI claim)
      Called after the claim state of a chunk is updated.

      Override this method and register the listener in IClaimsManagerTrackerAPI to handle chunk claim state updates however you'd like.

      Parameters:
      dimension - the dimension of the chunk, not null
      chunkX - the X coordinate of the chunk
      chunkZ - the Z coordinate of the chunk
      claim - the new claim state, null when the chunk is unclaimed
